dmca.title: Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

The website in question is currently not accessible as of 11:38:07 a.m.
(GMT-6) on August 08, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

The Planet


________________________________

From: Les Schwartz [mailto:optionpro@bellsouth.net] 
Posted At: Monday, August 07, 2006 2:37 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Copyright Infringement
Subject: Copyright Infringement
Importance: High






DecisionBar Trading Software(r) 

6555 Powerline Rd. #403
Ft. Lauderdale, FL 33309
Phone: 954-771-1920
Fax: 954-771-2337
Cell: 954-257-6825
http://www.decisionbar.com

<http://www.decisionbar.com/>  


August 7, 2006
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries
Attention: George Poletes, Corporate Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway, Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
Fax - (214) 782-7756
 
Re:  Copyright Infringement
 

Dear Mr Poletes:

I am Les Schwartz, the president of Les Schwartz, Inc. dba/DecisionBar
Trading Software.

I am the developer and copyright owner of the DecisionBar Trading
Software.  

I also have a pending trademark application for DecisionBar Trading and
the DecisionBar Trading Logo (Serial Number 78892901), and a pending
patent application for the DecisionBar Trading Software (Serial Number
60/785,246).

It has come to my attention that a pirated version of my software is
being distributed at sold at http://www.yourtrader.biz
<http://www.yourtrader.biz/> , hosted by theplanet.com or one of the
subsidiaries of theplanet.com.

The owner of www.yourtrader.biz <http://www.yourtrader.biz/>   is not
entitled to sell or distribute any of our programs or indicators and
doing so (copying our work and offering it for sale) constitutes
copyright infringement.
 
Please immediately disable this site and advise your client to remove
these copyrighted works from his website before activating his site
again.  Failing to do so will result in immediate litigation and
injunction against you and the owner of www.yourtrader.biz
<http://www.yourtrader.biz/> .
 
 
 

1.      http://www.yourtrader.biz/

2.      http://www.yourtrader.biz/decisionbar.html (DecisionBar
trademark also used without permission on this page.)

3.      http://www.yourtrader.biz/esignal.html (DecisionBar Trading
Software in list)

4.      http://www.yourtrader.biz/newproducts.html (DecisionBar Trading
Software in list)

 

 
Les Schwartz, Inc. dba/DecisionBar Trading Software  did not authorize
any of these sites to use, copy, or sell these products.
 
Les Schwartz, Inc. dba/DecisionBar Trading Software indicators are
protected by copyright notices on our own site, within the
documentation, within the code, and by a patent application.
 
I have a good faith belief that the use of the copyrighted materials
described above on the allegedly infringing web pages are not authorized
by the copyright owner (myself), my agent(s) or the law.
 
I swear under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code,
Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is
accurate and that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.
 
These copyrighted works should be removed immediately and/or access to
this site disabled.  The webmaster of the infringing site can be reached
via E-mail at yourtrader@yourtrader.biz .
 
Under the penalty of perjury, all information in this notice is
accurate, that I am the copyright owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.  Please inform me when this site has been disabled
at:  les@decisionbar.com.
 
Sincerely,

 
 
 
Les Schwartz
President,
Les Schwartz, Inc. dba/DecisionBar Trading Software














Les Schwartz
DecisionBar Trading Software
6555 NW 9th Ave., #403 
Ft. Lauderdale, FL 33309 
Phone: 800-228-4256, FAX: 954-771-2337 
Email1: optionpro@sprynet.com
Email2: les@decisionbar.com
http://www.decisionbar.com/
